The shared memories of generations of mooglekind flood into your mind, granting you the ability to decipher the cryptic glyphs of your 3����...1�
Soon or late, I knew you'd show up.You jus' don't know when to quit, do you?1�
Not that you need remindin', but you're all out of playin' pieces.No amount o' strugglin' will avail you now, so why don'tcha save us all some trouble and give up?1�
L-Larzos!1�
Shame on you for betraying Lilisette and  's trust! Turning your coats!1�
Worse, you went so far as to sell your souls to the Dark Divinity like a sack of yams! A bag of popotoes!1�
Hah. A creature as near a beastman as makes no difference would presume to admonish me?1�
My soul is for sale to neither god nor man.1�
There existed an enemy that wanted for vanquishing. I merely made a choice--one that granted me the power I needed to accomplish my objectives.1�
Do not think ill of me,  .1�
Even you, Portia...1�
Selfish though this must sound, it matters not what becomes of me...or the future.�
But a world without Sir Ragelise is like a world bereft of light. I could not abide in such a place.1�
You've made a habit o' questionin' our motives, cat, but what o' your own?1�
You and yours seek to prevent the true future from comin' to pass.Me and mine, on the other hand, have taken up arms against Altana's will.1�
Fact is, both our existences are sinful in the eyes o' the gods, and there ain't no changin' that.1�
What!? I won't stand for such slander! Hisss!Unlike you unsavory bunch, we fight to realize an ideal, Goddess-sanctioned world! We fight for great justice!1�
Spare us the rhetoric. Even a hoodman could see that next to nothing separates our two factions--that we're but two sides of the same coin.1�
I, for one, could care less for justice and utopias.1�
We glaze our words with honey and put on a righteous facade, but in truth we're naught more than power-starved scoundrels.1�
Even as I stood engulfed in the cold flames of the underworld, I became awakened to my deepest, darkest desires.'Twas such an epiphany as I had never known.1�
I have all my life been a soldier. By the sword have I lived, and by it shall I die.I shall slay the Shadow Lord...or perish in so trying.1�
Ringaling...1�
I have chosen my path, as you have yours. There's naught to say nor do now but stay our resolve and see things through to the last.1�
Y-you're...�
Consider this a mirror into your future,  .1�
What will you say?It'll be all right!Trust in me!1�

�/
�c�c [Normal/Critical]�
At long last, mine efforts have borne fruit, kupo! I was able to contact Cait Sith, though I dare not pretend the fruits of my labor are either succulent or sweet.1�
A prolix puffball I may be, but even I know when to stay my tongue. If thou dost in sooth covet an explanation, avaunt to yon distortion with thee, kupo.1�
Before that, however, I must inquire as to whether thou art in possession of any 5����.1�
Pardon my forthrightness, but I shall be needing one, kupo.1�
To be more precise, thou wilt need what I shall fashion from this 3����. Show but momentary patience and its puissance shall be revealed to thee, kupo!1�
Ah, it is done, kupo!It misseth somewhat of mine old subtleties; my paws are not as they once were. Yet, it shall serve.1�

With this in hand, not e'en the winds of temporal maelstrom shall impede your progress in passing betwixt planes of existence. However, my guarantee expires after thou reachest t'other side, kupopopo.1�
Shouldst thou eft desire my services, speak but a word and I shall craft another 3���� befitting an adventurer of thy proven valour.1�
Yet when hast thou known me to bequeath anything unto thee swoopstake?Thou mayest hold a contrary opinion, but I believe an appropriate amount of time must be given to create a masterpiece.1�

Indeed...If my calculations prove correct, preparations for the next batch should conclude in 
� ��[minute/minutes] (Earth time).1�

It would hardly do for thy mortal frame to be encumbered overmuch by a surplus of stones, kupo. Therefore, I shall supply thee with no more than 
� at a given time.1�

Shouldst thou find thyself overborne by my concoctions, I could take custody of them, should such be thy wish. Wot ye well, though: wings I may have, but wings do not a brainless beast of burden make, kupo.1�
Fie for shame on my porous memory, kupo! I quite forgot.1�
Methinks I entrusted thee with investigating of the Walk of Echoes, kupo.1�
If the urge to adventure within these confines should ever strike, prithee inform me of thy desire first.1�
Very well now. Let us now speak of transport, kupo.1�
Fear not the journey, for if my stone faileth to protect thee, Cait Sith hath given her word that thy passage shall be safe, kupo.1�
Hast thou sufficiently steeled thyself for the journey yonder?1�
Art thou prepared?Verily.Nay.1�
Warp to  �[???/Provenance/Walk of Echoes/Pashhow Marshlands]?Yes.No.1�
Understood. Simply say the word whenas thy preparations are complete, kupo.1�
In the meantime, I shall busy myself with tasks too menial to mention, kupo.1�
First, a word of caution. Do not overexert thyself, for fatigue begets weakness and wanion.May Altana's blessing light thy way, kupo.1�
And now we play the waiting game, kupo.1�
Time is of the essence, kupo! 1�
Onward!1�
Incidentally, hast thou ever pondered, excogitated, or ruminated on the genesis of this celestial body we call home, kupo?1�

I profess to have tried many a time and failed at each--I comprehend not a whit, kupo.Canst thou imagine the scale...the myriad events interlocked so spectacularly as to lead us as we are to this specific point, at this particular moment?1�
If thou cannot, take heart. Nor can any creature that measureth its lifespan in years instead of eons.1�
Awash in the eternal flow of time, individuals are naught but flotsam.Such is true equally for the most notable noble, and the most abject almsman, kupo.1�

Death is all that lieth at the mouth of the river, yet maugre its foreordained nature, we struggle mightily against its current, kupo.Were I queried as to the beauty of life, that is the answer I would give, my crystal-culling compatriot.1�
Howbeit, mine answer may differ from thine, as thine may from another's.A single, consummate conclusion doth not exist, any search for one would taxeth the mind needlessly, kupo.1�
And yet, one thing is for certain.We all have our own interpretations, and from those spring forth an infinite number of possibilities, kupo.1�
I am me, thou art thee, our current lives but droplets in the sea.Thou art encompassed always by alternate realities...and the choice to change is always present, kupo.1�
Cait Sith hath conferred one such choice upon thee, kupo.1�

Should thou desirest to eft traverse the primordial planes of Provenance, but speak my name and I shall come swooping to thy aid.'Tis my station to ensure thy safe passage to a new dimension--and new reality, kupo.1�
Fare thee well,  , and may the wisdom of the Magians help lead thee to thine own light.1�
Can't...not......strength.1�
I...you...thoughts...gathering strength...1�
Can you...me? Past...faure...Jugn...ine Glac...1�
Nya...three...reconstr...me.Plea...1�
Power...Mete...No...Ornate Door...waiting...1�
Nyan!  , I can finally communicate like before! You're the best!1�
I forgot how I promised to be of use to you! Serve you well!1�
Yes, forgot! Failed to remember!1�
But I can help you! No, not in the way you might hope. Our world has rules, too. Ways of doing things. Must abide properly.1�
Rules which go beyond the world of man. Encompass the entirety of all universes and dimensions.1�
Don't ask me why! I didn't make them, I just play by them!1�
Or have you forgotten all you have learned? Had your memories consumed? Let us then wake them up with a spar! A contest of claws!1�
Warp to Witchfire Glen?Proceed.Not now.1�
I travel......hear lots...Hear...stories... Can tell...if...1�
Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.Let's hear some more!1�

What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.When Wills Collide.Whispers of Dawn.Fork in the Road.Maiden of the Dusk(pt.1).Maiden of the Dusk(pt.2).Maiden of the Dusk(pt.3).Where It All Began(pt.1).Where It All Began(pt.2).Where It All Began(pt.3).Brace for the Unknown(pt.1).Brace for the Unknown(pt.2).Ad Infinitum.Champion of the Dawn(pt.1).Champion of the Dawn(pt.2).Champion of the Dawn(pt.3).Champion of the Dawn(pt.4).The Dawn Also Rises(pt.1).The Dawn Also Rises(pt.2).The Dawn Also Rises(pt.3).A Forbidden Reunion(pt.1).A Forbidden Reunion(pt.2).A Forbidden Reunion(pt.3).A Forbidden Reunion(pt.4).A Forbidden Reunion(pt.5).A Forbidden Reunion(pt.6).Sacrifice.Somber Dreams(pt.1).Somber Dreams(pt.2).Of Light and Darkness(pt.1).Of Light and Darkness(pt.2).Of Light and Darkness(pt.3).Of Light and Darkness(pt.4).1�
Hast thou sufficiently steeled thyself for the journey yonder?1�
What will you do?Ask to be transported.Request 3����.Check 3���� stock.Ask about #����.Request 3����.Nothing for now.1�
How many dost thou desire?None, for the nonce.One should suffice.The whole batch.1�
Here is your 3���� allotment,  .Waste not a one, kupo.1�

It appears thou hast exceeded thy allotment of 
� ��[stone/stones].Regrettable as it is, I cannot provision thee with more, kupo.1�

I am unable to craft any more at this juncture, kupo.Howbeit, if my calculations prove correct, preparations for the next batch should conclude in 
� ��[minute/minutes] (Earth time).1�

Thine outstanding allocation of 5����?Should my records hold true, thou still hast 
 to thy name, kupo.1�
Ye gads!1�
Canst thou not perceive this power, kupo!? This sensation of the selfsame ilk as what writhes behind yon distortion?1�
Oh ho ho, meseems it doth emanate from thy Voidwalker remnant, kupo.1�
Mayhap we can channel this force to forge 6����!1�

Yet using a single source would leave myriad questions anent its integrity.Collecting 
 of those Voidwalker fragments, however, should supply ample energy for its creation, kupo.1�
Approach me with the requisite bounty in hand and I shall begin the conversion process eftsoons.1�

I can provide you with 6����...for a fee of 
� gil.1�

Hand over 
� gil?Gladly!On second thought...1�
It appears you will have to wait one day (Vana'diel time) before receiving another 3����.�
Gadzooks!I should have known that such an imposing force of incomprehensible puissance could only originate from thee,  .1�
Hist...Do mine eyes deceive me...or is that forsooth an Empyrean weapon, kupo?1�
Meseems I've gotten ahead of myself. For a moment, exorbitant amounts of excitement pumped palpably betwixt and between the chambers of my heart.1�
Howbeit, thy perseverance shocks me, kupo. To obtain such a specimen is no easy feat.1�
I reckoned this day would come from the moment I sensed thou hadst harnessed the tablets' powers, kupo.1�
Aye, this torrent of diction has been brewing in my belly for moons multitudinous, and now the time has come to unleash it upon thee.1�
What I hope I have already made abundantly clear is that thy weapon holdeth within itself a dynamism, kupo.1�
What? Thou wishest for a more corporeal description? So it shall be, kupo.Parfay, the force is strong enough to cast off all darkness that could ever threaten to enshroud Vana'diel.1�
The rub is that it may only be channeled via a conduit. Without the physical weapon, 'tis naught but an abstract concept upon which scholars speculate, kupo.1�
...Erewhile, that is.1�
Shouldst thou desire, I can transplant that dynamism into thee. It shall course through thy veins, and summoning it would be as simple as seeing a sweven.Doth this interest thee to any extent?1�
Does it interest you?Yes! Give me the power!Not at the moment.1�
By the mysterious moogle magic that mills about inside me, I call the transposition to commencement, kupo!1�
...Didst thou know, peradventure, that the power of which I speak is cleped ��weapon skill�� in thy vernacular? I want no misunderstandings before progressing with the procedure.1�
By the mysterious moogle magic that meanders through me, I call the transposition to commencement, kupo!1�
Before we begin, I must needs inform thee that not all the vessel's power may be transferred.1�
That fearsome phenomenon ye adventurers term ��aftermath�� would, as its name implies, rend thy armament asunder should it be removed, kupo.1�
Thus, I can only transpose the aspect oft cleped ��weapon skill�� in thy vernacular.1�
Now that I have dispensed with the disclaimer, 'tis time to traipse onward toward matters of more import, kupo.1�

The mysterious moogle magic I must employ differs depending on the weapon and the skill that accompanies it. In accordance, thou must needs select an appropriate armament from which to extract its essence.1�
Eftsoons thy request hast been spoke, I shall set about making the requisite preparations, kupo.1�
Designate thy desire, kupo.1�
Which skill set shalt thou select?Hand-to-hand.Dagger.Sword.Great Sword.Axe.Great Axe.Scythe.Polearm.Katana.Great Katana.Club.Staff.Archery.Marksmanship.None for the nonce.1�

Is this the one?Verily.Nay.1�

Should this precious piece of warwaging wonder reside in thy satchel, I beseech thee bequeath it to me anon. If not, I shall wait until time immemorial for thy return, kupo.1�
Yoicks! Have I made a mistake, kupo?1�

, I knew you would come back. Return to me.1�
